title: RIIVERDANCE

description.plain: In RIIVERDANCE, Beyoncé brings a classic Country instrument devised by Dolly Parton, using fingernails as percussion, to generate a classic track that mixes with Beyoncé’s usual music, inviting you to love, dance and move freely.

embed_content: Read “RIIVERDANCE” by Beyoncé on Genius

body.plain: In RIIVERDANCE, Beyoncé brings a classic Country instrument devised by Dolly Parton, using fingernails as percussion, to generate a classic track that mixes with Beyoncé’s usual music, inviting you to love, dance and move freely.
